user_query: I'm working on a research project about the US Presidential Election and I need the results for all states for the year 2008. Can you fetch me the state results including the total votes and candidate results? Also, provide me with the details of a specific movie titled 'Game of Thrones' such as the running time, number of episodes, and the year it started.

TaskList.description: Fetch the US Presidential Election results for all states in 2008, including total votes and candidate results.
Fetch the details of the movie 'Game of Thrones' including running time, number of episodes, and year it started.
